page-blurb:
Yes, you.

You do not know it yet, but with just a flick of your finger you can unleash an army of minions who will spend all their working hours fighting for the causes that you care about. While your friends post angry status messages bemoaning the injustices in this world, you can make sure that this tireless army works every day towards bringing positive changes in the world around you.

Be the armchair superhero the world deserves. Pick the causes dearest to you enable them to carry on the fight. We have selected some of the top organizations here so you don't have to go hunting for them.

Onward!

causes-list.name: Planned Parenthood
causes-list.description: Provides reproductive and other health services.

causes-list.name: National Organization For Women
causes-list.description: Grassroots activism since 1966.

causes-list.name: International Refugee Assistance Project
causes-list.description: Assisting the world's most vulnerable refugees.

causes-list.name: UNHCR
causes-list.description: The UN refugee agency.

causes-list.name: International Rescue Committee
causes-list.description: Responding to the world's worst humanitarian crises.

causes-list.name: Save The Children
causes-list.description: Helping children in Syria and elsewhere.

causes-list.name: Conservation International
causes-list.description: Science, policy and partnerships to protect nature.

causes-list.name: Natural Resources Defence Council
causes-list.description: Climate change is real.

causes-list.name: Wildlife Conservation Society
causes-list.description: Saving wildlife and wild places worldwide. Managing the world's largest system of urban wildlife parks.

causes-list.name: Cheetah Conservation Fund
causes-list.description: Cheetahs are on the brink of extinction.

causes-list.name: ACLU
causes-list.description: Defend individual rights and liberties.

causes-list.name: National Lawyers Guild
causes-list.description: Using the law to protect civil liberties and strengthen the rights of people.

causes-list.name: Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF)
causes-list.description: Defending your rights in the digital world

causes-list.name: Southern Poverty Law Center
causes-list.description: Fighting hate, promoting tolerance, and bringing justice to the powerless.

causes-list.name: NAACP
causes-list.description: Fighting race-based discrimination.

causes-list.name: National Immigration Law Center
causes-list.description: Information on the law, and the employment and public benefits rights of immigrants.

causes-list.name: Teach For America
causes-list.description: Enlisting our future leaders to become teachers in low-income communities.

causes-list.name: KIPP
causes-list.description: Network of free college-prep schools in under-resourced communities.

causes-list.name: Khan Academy
causes-list.description: Providing a free world-class education for anyone anywhere.

causes-list.name: The Malala Fund
causes-list.description: Ensure that every girl can complete 12 years of safe, quality education.

causes-list.name: Doctors Without Borders
causes-list.description: Medical projects in war-torn regions and developing countries.

causes-list.name: Red Cross
causes-list.description: Protecting the life and dignity of the victims of armed conflicts and natural disasters.

causes-list.name: Pro Publica
causes-list.description: Holding those in power accountable.

causes-list.name: Free Press
causes-list.description: Fighting to save Net Neutrality and freedom of the press.

causes-list.name: National Public Radio
causes-list.description: Donate to your local public radio.

causes-list.name: The New York Times
causes-list.description: Support a print publication and keep institutions honest.

causes-list.name: True Colors Fund
causes-list.description: End homelessness among lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender youth.

causes-list.name: Human Rights Campaign
causes-list.description: Equal rights for LGBTQ people.

causes-list.name: The Trevor Project
causes-list.description: Crisis intervention and suicide prevention services for LGBTQ people.

causes-list.name: The Trans Lifeline
causes-list.description: Hotline staffed by transgender people for transgender people.

causes-list.name: Everytown for Gun Safety
causes-list.description: Counterweight to NRA. Promoting responsible gun ownership and pushing for sensible gun laws.

causes-list.name: Coalition to Stop Gun Violence
causes-list.description: Umbrella group of gun control advocacy organizations.

causes-list.name: Brady Campaign
causes-list.description: Aims to cut US gun deaths in half by 2025.

footer: This site is not affiliated with any organization listed above. Tweet to get in touch. Share with your friends.
